author: Don Javier Delgado Corona
description: Basically a Cuba Libre made with tequila in place of rum and an all-important pinch of salt.
name: Batanga
recipeIngredient: 105 ml Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR salt with lime juice in base of glass to dissolve salt
Add ice and other ingredients and briefly stir
